Name: require_product_owner_assigned
Description: Each project must have a Product Owner

Name: team_size_minimum
Description: Team must have at least 5 members

Name: worker_max_load
Description: Worker availability must not drop below 50%

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint length must be exactly 2 weeks

Name: backlog_refinement_mandatory
Description: Each sprint must be preceded by backlog refinement

Name: scrum_board_must_exist
Description: Every sprint must have an active Scrum Board

Name: velocity_based_estimation
Description: Sprint planning effort must not exceed historical max velocity

Name: all_stories_have_points
Description: All user stories in sprint backlog must have story points

Name: no_duplicate_user_stories
Description: Prevent identical user story titles in the same backlog

Name: required_skills_for_tasks
Description: Assigned worker must have required skill for task

Name: sprint_review_participation
Description: At least 3 stakeholders must attend sprint review
